attributes.action: Reconsider your decisions made about Egypt!
attributes.additional_details: The people affected in Egypt may not be British, but they are humans whom the government are blind to when taking these decisions. The government is indirectly giving in to the demands of terrorists by cutting of tourism.
attributes.background: From what was said in 2013 about the Revolution being a military coup to suspending flights to Sharm, you are destroying a country and a city of peace where many of us Britons spend our holiday. Families depend on tourism and stopping that just places more people in poverty.

rejection.details:
Your petition does not include a clear action which you want the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you started a petition with a specific action, we could look at this again.
